sources.title: 2009 - Fatal Secret - Three friends. One liar. Zero mercy - Thriller Movie
sources.description:
A high-stakes game of truth where friendship faces its ultimate test. Secrets don't stay buried forever!
Julia enlists friends Sharlene and Rebecca to confront Scott after a traumatic encounter reveals his dangerous double life. Their investigation uncovers a web of deception that threatens to consume them all.

Original Title: Balancing the Books (2009) | AKA: Restitution Road

metadata.Plot: A defected KGB agent will deliver a floppy disk with important information to the CIA. During the mission he is killed and the floppy disk gets into the hands of Michael LeWinter.
